page.title: 07FARMS AND FARMLAND
page.content: Within the block are 8 farms, Derby Hills, Common, Southwood,Heath-End, Home, Lodge, Scotland, Springwood. The farmland is of quality grade, with the soil overlying sandstone rocks especially around Staunton Harold Reservoir. The farms are a mixture of dairy, arable, small-holdings and dwelling houses. The land is used for pasture, grazing,hay,silage, crops grown are barley, winter and spring wheat, oats, oil-seed rape, root crops e.g. potatoes,vegetable crops e.g. cabbage, peas, brussels. The farms have Friesian cows, calves, beef cattle and sheep mainly Suffolk Cross.The farmland is scattered with mature deciduous trees and planted woodland. The hedges are neatly trimmed or layered around the area.
